name: London Women's Care
description: Comprehensive healthcare facility providing care for the entire family at one convenient location. Services include Primary Care, Obstetrics & Gynecology, Pediatrics, Dentistry, and Behavioral Health. LWC offers preventive care, chronic condition management, prenatal and postpartum care, well-child visits, dental services, and mental health support. The facility accepts most insurance plans and provides discounts for uninsured patients based on family size and income.
source: Verified from official website and multiple sources
notes: Comprehensive family healthcare facility with multiple specialties under one roof. Offers patient portal access through FollowMyHealth. Emergency services available 24/7 by calling 911. Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/LondonWomensCare/
